issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Android: Accessibility : LVH values are not read on ProgressBar clicks.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run Acceptance Access_1107 on Accessibility module.
2. Touch the second progress bar

Expected:
The device reads aloud the message field of the control followed by LVH 

Actual:
Device reads out just "Clicked"
fields.summary: Android: Accessibility : LVH values are not read on ProgressBar clicks
fields.environment:
Android Version : 4.0.4
SDK: 3.1.0.v20130327135307
CLI version : 3.0.25-alpha
OS : MAC OSX 10.8.2
